text-2.title: About Our Company
text-2.text: LogiPro was founded to make a mark in London’s Clearing and Forwarding industry. LogiPro started its operations in all the major cities in Europe with the aim to offer the best in logipro services.

text-3.title: LogiPro Headquarter
text-3.text:
Global Logistic, London 4-5 Spring St, London
+1-702-894-8177

filedownload-widget-2.title: Company Presentation
filedownload-widget-2.content: LogiPro is committed to meeting every customer’s needs through a variety of efficient and affordable delivery services.

testimonial-widget-2.title: Wisteria Ravenclaw
testimonial-widget-2.content: If you do the job badly enough, sometimes you don't get asked to do it again.
